name: Accretion Glaive
effect: The Accretion Glaive automatically returns at the end of any turn it is thrown. Any time the Accretion Glaive deals damage, the Heat it inflicts increases by 1 until the end of the scene, to a maximum of 6.
description: Formed out of charged particles drawn in by a captured singularity, the Accretion Glaive is a remarkably efficient weapon, as it technically requires no external power source. Containing it is another matter entirely.

name: Penrose Accumulator
effect: Any target in the central hex of this weapon's AoE which has 1 Structure and 7 or less HP at the time of firing is instantly destroyed, leaving no wreck behind. Size 4 and lower cover inside the blast radius is instantly destroyed.
description:
"This place is familiar. It is like a childhood memory, I think. I see this place, and...not this place.
I am...starting to lose track. Of which reality is true.
My own memory is left wanting. This place... I can tell. I can see all the space around this memory.
I know something is missing only by the shape of my memories around it. It is lost... like a fog.
I remember... everything. Ragnarok. The only way I would not know of this place... is if that part was taken. I intend to find it again."
-- Godsoldier Deus Rex, to Daemon 'Ragnarok'
